content.event: AWS hands-on: running serverless Django with Zappa
content.description: Online hands-on workshop for local AWS community in the Baltics about serverless and running a basic Django app on AWS Lambda with Zappa.

content.event: Introduction to AWS SQS for Web Application Task Queue
content.description: Di Community Online Talk Kali ini 8 Juli 2020, Ridwan Fadjar Septian akan meberikan pengenalan mengenai AWS SQS, untuk antrian tugas di sebuah aplikasi web (Web Application Task Queue).

content.event: AWS Roadshow Virtual 2020 - 10 Serverless con AWS Lambda
content.description: Conocerás los aspectos principales del servicio AWS Lambda. Hablaremos sobre los principales beneficios del cómputo serverless en AWS. xCrearemos una función de cómputo basada en Node.JS. Explicar
content.organizer: AWS User Group Ciudad de México

content.event: Webinar: Debugging AWS Lambda Performance  Issues
content.description: Yan Cui, AWS Serverless Hero, and Avia Mor, Lumigo co-founder, will cover tackling Lambda performance issues, including collecting the right telemetry, identifying bottlenecks, and removing them.

content.event: Lightweight Serverless Cloud Functions with Java and Quarkus
content.description: In this low-slides, high-code, session, we’ll dive into how Java, with the Cloud Native optimized framework Quarkus, is an excellent platform for building Cloud Functions.
In this follow-along Meetup, we'll explore Amazon Web Services (AWS) and how its platform can be used to bring out a new type of full-stack-development in the cloud.

content.event: Building Full stack Serverless App with Gunnar Grosch
content.description: This session is the second part of our Full Stack Serverless Series. This session will have more demo, code and less presentation.
content.organizer: Pune AWS and Cloud User Group

content.description: Register for a two day exploration of full stack cloud development with AWS Amplify, a set of tools and services to build secure, scalable cloud-powered mobile and web applications.
Second edition of ServerlessDays Virtual with a busload of great speakers and talks.
ServerlessDays Hamburg is a 2-day conference about Serverless technologies with one day of workshops and one day with talks.
We bring together the world’s leading software architects and cloud experts to share their ideas and knowledge.
